price: ߊ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߒߠߋ ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲ ߤߊ߫߸ ߒ ߧߋ߫ ߛߌߟߊ߲߫ ߠߊ߫ ߘߋ߬ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊߣߊ߬ ߒ ߡߊߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī akhāfu an yukadhibūni
